name: Bow Necklace
description: Elegant bow necklace with customizable bead positions and charm attachment point
svg_template: <svg width="400" height="300" viewBox="0 0 400 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><linearGradient id="goldGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:1" /><stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#FFA500;stop-opacity:1" /><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FF8C00;stop-opacity:1" /></linearGradient></defs><!-- Chain path --><path d="M50 150 Q100 120, 150 130 Q200 140, 250 130 Q300 120, 350 150" stroke="url(#goldGradient)" stroke-width="3" fill="none" /><!-- Bow center --><ellipse cx="200" cy="150" rx="15" ry="8" fill="url(#goldGradient)" /><!-- Bow left wing --><path d="M185 150 Q170 135, 160 150 Q170 165, 185 150" fill="url(#goldGradient)" /><!-- Bow right wing --><path d="M215 150 Q230 135, 240 150 Q230 165, 215 150" fill="url(#goldGradient)" /><!-- Position markers (will be replaced with components) --><!--POSITION_chain_1--><!--POSITION_chain_2--><!--POSITION_chain_3--><!--POSITION_chain_4--><!--POSITION_chain_5--><!--POSITION_bow_charm--><!--POSITION_side_charm_left--><!--POSITION_side_charm_right--></svg>
